name: Sticky_Capsules
author: Goobboy
title: Sticky capsules
description:
Faster combat robots with more friction so they orbit less around you and stay closer. Has to be researched in late game. You can modify the speed and the friction in the settings.

-Only applies to destroyer capsules for now.
-Also increase their range (can be modified in settings)
-Also increase their life time (can be modified in settings)
-Also can increase the number of robots per capsule (can be modified in settings)
